pages.text: I've found an city in the wilderness, abandoned by all people and instead, filled with undead. Along with the usual zombies there is a new creature I've never seen before. It looks like a clump of muscles, very much alive, moving without a brain.$(br2)I killed a few of them and they drop flesh and rarely their soul, which I know will be useful.
Why was this city abandoned? What is this new creature and where did it come from?
